column5: The studio is attached to the garage which gives you private access. The studio has a bathroom and shower inside. Wifi is available through the property. The studio has a king size bed and a table to eat. 3 minutes away from DOWNTOWN! The property is next to 45 interstate and is gated with cable tv. Plenty of restaurants close by! The house has a bar and pool table with a barbecue pit on the property that can be used during your time there.
